title: game start problem
body: hi. i have a problem when i start the game after the champion select. when the timer end in champion select and the mach has to bigin it is opening a white frame and it writes that the data (d3dx9_39.dll) is missing from the computer.. help plz.... what sould i do?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: Your issue may be caused by a corrupt file that is failing to render properly.  No worries, we have a [game crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) that offers a few steps to get this fixed up.  As a first step, I recommend[ running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) as Rineyy suggested.  This will scan your game files for any corrupt files and fix them.  Please let us know if your issue persists or if you have any questions!

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

This should solve your issue, let us know if it works or not.
